sentences.en: Go to homemaking company seeking advice directly!
Homemaking and rearing children are jobs for girls only.
sentences.cn: 家管与抚养小孩都是只限女生做的工作.

sentences.en: I shouldn’t say she had the homemaking instinct .
sentences.cn: 我应该说她没有持家的天性。

sentences.en: In Step II Homemaking, you will a collaborative homemaking process with your partners.
sentences.cn: 阶段二的造家过程中, 你将会与你的对友一起发堀造家的过程.

sentences.en: Many women still place emphasis on the importance of homemaking.
sentences.cn: 许多女士仍然强调持家的重要.

sentences.en: Soviet women carry the main burden of shopping, homemaking and child rearing.
sentences.cn: 苏联的妇女承担的主要义务就是采购, 做家务及抚养孩子.

sentences.en: Titus 2 instructs older women to mentor younger women, and teach them to care for their husbands and children and homemaking responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 泰特斯 2让年长的女人去教导年轻女子，让她们照看好自己的丈夫、孩子和家庭。

sentences.en: Young girls were typically taught homemaking skills.
sentences.cn: 女孩子一般接受家务技能教育。
